featureSchema.name: Reminders and Notifications
featureSchema.description: Enables push notifications to remind users of deadlines and supports recurring tasks to automate frequent reminders.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to receive notifications for deadlines and set recurring tasks so that I never miss important activities.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: Push notifications should be sent based on due dates and recurrence rules. Users should be able to configure the timing and frequency of reminders.
featureSchema.additional: Ensure notification permissions are handled appropriately and include options to disable or customize them.
featureSchema.prompt: Implement a reminder system that integrates with push notifications and supports recurring task scheduling. The solution should allow users to set custom notification intervals.
featureSchema.notes: Consider integration with device calendars and notification APIs for a seamless user experience.
